snippet: Using technical and artistic ingenuity, planners created interior stages for theater, dance and music in a way that invites brainstorming about the plant’s future.
abstract: Hearn Generating Station, former power plant in Toronto’s industrial Port Lands area, is transformed into temporary, multi-stage performance and exhibition space for Luminato Festival; future of crumbling building after festival is uncertain.
lead_paragraph: Using technical and artistic ingenuity, planners created interior stages for theater, dance and music in a way that invites brainstorming about the plant’s future.

headline.main: The Luminato Festival Turns a Former Power Plant Into a Creative Engine
headline.print_headline: A Power Plant Reborn as a Red-Hot Engine of Creative Pluck
